content.detailedDescription:
My parents came to visit and as they were leaving they noticed a large orange glow in the sky that started out very large and appeared to be something on fire in the sky. they were just sitting in the middle of the street in their car. i asked my dad if they forgot something and he told me to look at the orange glow in the sky. 
it was a very cold evening about 27���. all the stars were visible and the moon was a big sliver in the western sky. as i looked up in the southern sky i could see an orange glow that appeared like a planet that was close. but it got smaller and smaller and started to move in a north easterly direction towards us. i thought it was a plane on fire but there was no sound. it appeared to be flickering like something on fire but it moved very slowly. it kept getting smaller and smaller until it suddenly disappeared. i suggested to my dad that maybe it was a meteor? but that didn���t explain why it moved so slow?
just as we were discussing what we saw another huge bright orange orb was glowing in the southern sky. my dad said it came from the same direction as the one we just saw. it rose right above the tree line and continued to climb into the sky. i went into the house to tell my wife and my daughter and we all watched it just hover in the sky. it too got smaller and smaller until it just vanished. just like the first one we saw? the whole thing lasted only a few minutes. (maybe 3-5 minutes.)
i am 51 years old and have never seen anything like it? my parents are in their 70���s and said they have never seen anything like it either. (my dad is a retired police officer.) 
i came into the house to watch the 10:00pm news to see if anyone else reported seeing anything like we had but they didn���t mention anything in the news. (our news comes out of cincinnati, oh)
i would be very curious if anyone else in bright, indiana saw the same thing on this evening of february 25th, 2012? 
when i told my friends and colleagues at work they all asked if i took any pictures. i had my cellphone in my pocket which has a built in camera, but i was so intrigued by what i was seeing that i didn���t even think to take pictures. it is an event that i will never forget. i find myself constantly looking toward the sky as if to see it again.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright orange globe shaped object on a clear night.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming out of work tonight around 6:45 pm with my 2 other coworkers & i always look at the night sky when i come out . we were talking for about 5 minutes when soething caught the corner of my eye , when saw something move here when i lookked over to orions belt area i saw 2 moving i thought stars , but they were reddish in color there was 2 of them , going in a very fast  pattern it would change directional paths it seem it was also moving fast out of our atmoshpere, less than 30 secounds later a 3rd one was right behind alomst in the same irratic path , all 3 of us, witnessed it , not sure what is was , it did not look like a meteor shower or a satliette or rocker ship, moving too fast with odd up & down paths & side to side then would almost  a u turn movement. i lost site of the object because it was too far out of our  atomoshpere it move from southeast to northeast.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 ufo

content.detailedDescription: Around 6am this morning near east town in grand rapids michigan, i took our puppy out to take care of her buisness. looking up as i almost always do nowadays i witnessed a non-blinking light heading north through the broken cloud cover. the light did make a slight course correction while heading north, but it didn't "feel" like a plane movement. oh and this happened nearly directly overhead. well this peaked my interest so i stayed out a bit longer and was not disappointed. about 5 minutes later i saw a light that was very different from the first and lower in altitude heading south, it was flying through the clouds. this light was pulsing, the light would go out completely and come back on full strength every three to four inches from my vantage point, i think i counted five to six pulses before i lost it completely. neither of these lights was in the normal airport flight path. i got a little freaked out by the last one and decided it was time to go back in.
content.summary: Around 6 am this morning took my puppy out to do her biz. witnessed two lights within about 5 mins of each other

content.detailedDescription: While sleeping outside with my family, we saw, in the early am on a cloudless, clear starry night, a group of four (4) lights, with the appearance of stars, came from the north to overhead and stopped.  three were in a row with one centered in front.  all were equally spaced apart but in a close grouping.  the one on the east end of the row of three took off and disappeared on the eastern horizon in a matter of a few seconds; faster than anything i know to be possible.  the others stayed in place for several minutes.  the one that left returned,at the same impossible speed, and stopped from where it had left.  the four then appeared to ascend until they faded out of sight within a few seconds.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Four starlike cluster moving nouth to south one on east left at a high rate of speed and returned all went up and faded out of sight

content.detailedDescription: On the other hand my description of what i saw was the truth. the sighting was back in 1975
content.summary: Please disregard my friends sighting. he informed me it was fake.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way back home from curch on wensday.We were at a stop light when i looked in to the sky and noticed a long rectangle shape in the sky,this had lights all around it and one bigger white light that looked to be a spot light. my first thaught was a cell tower of some type. but then the object started to move to the right of me, then to the left much faster than the first movment was. i was very excited , my hart was pounding. the craft seemed to follow the car for baout 3 sec. or so.
content.summary: In car, look up see rectangular craft. was still, then moved.

content.detailedDescription:
was walking to my car at 5:28 am to head in to work.  not sure what made me look up because the object or objects made absolutely no noise.  when i did look up, i saw a single bright, glowing, red light shoot through the sky so fast that it could have been easily missed.  somewhat in disbelief of what i had just seen, i stood there wondering whether or not my eyes may have been playing tricks on me.  literally seconds later, another brightly glowing red light shot through the sky headed the same direction, very close to the the path of the first object.  after seeing the second object, i knew i had actually witnessed something that could not be explained.  it was not a meteor or something falling from space.  no tail, no trail, no noise, and flying relatively low.  
  later that evening, i ran into my neighbor at the post office and he asked me if i had seen the red fast moving objects also.  he had seen them as well when walking his dog.
content.summary: Extremely fast red lights

content.detailedDescription: Back in about 1975 i witnessed the same type of ufo my friend captured a picture of the other day. he told me about the flight path of this ufo and it was almost exactly the same thing i witnessed back in 1975. my viewing was as follows. our sightings are very similar. i observed  a flashing light in the sky witch at first i thought was a plane traveling to newark airport. it was only after the flashing light came to a stop directly above us high in the sky that i determined it to be a helicopter hovering. as i watched the flashing light it suddenly took off at a high rate of speed then stopped on a dime in a different location, it then did the same thing again stopping in another location on a dime. after a couple of seconds it took off at what i would describe as warp speed and vanished into the night. i'm sending the photo my friend snapped with his digital camera.
content.summary: My dear friend forwarded the picture of this ufo and briefly told me what he saw.

content.detailedDescription: This case being reported by investigator beverly trout.  individual was in ufo adult education class.  she was at shopping mall and began to cross a street to go to a party when she saw a silent black oval/egg-shaped object with lights at front and back, and with many lighted windows.  witness thinks 2/10 mile away at stop lights.  object did a right-angle turn and came to within 350 feet away from her.  she was so frightened she looked down when it got close, and so did not watch it depart, or disappear.  she describes object as less than width of the 4-lane plus turn lane street where she was standing, so possibly it was 40-50 feet in size.  object was low; witness thinks not much above treetop level.
content.summary: 40-50 foot oval object with many lighted windows and white light at both ends, low level, 350 feet away

content.detailedDescription: My friend photgraphed this ufo with his i pad i will send you the photos as soon as possible .There has been a lot of activity over this area since october 2011.This is the first pictures taken of craft that has been seen by many people in that area. i suspect that they are interested in the large fresh water springsin that area around sculpter falls near lost creek country club.
content.summary: Yellow gold disc 100 ft in diameter white center dome

content.detailedDescription: Geeze, non-stop sightings, every night. i sit out in the yard. multiples. even with star filled sky, notice them immediately,they're easy to spot. color is off from star color. more yellowish, glittery, white hot white & a little red. altitudes vary, all move in amazing ways. stop, start on a dime, up, down, diagonal, circular, backward, forward. i feel amazed, but not surprised anymore, i think, oh there they are again. i believe they've always been here, watching, observing. probably thinking, not getting near those creatures, look what they do to each other, we wouldn't stand a chance. we'll just watch them self destruct from a safe distance. i lose sight when i go to bed for the night.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Multiples- star like, but color is noticibly off, 3 lights in triangle & 5 lights in cigar shape.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home for lunch from work,i didn,t spot the object in the sky at 1st .
as i turn left onto berrymills road,
i puzzled for a moment ,as there where 6 cars parked off to side of the road, with the occupances standing outside of their vechicals ,looking into the sky ?
where my attention was drawn to the same part of the sky , where a silver color cylinder
was hovering motionless in the western part of the sky , it was a clear ,and sunny ,
it looked like it was about a mile away, its color was like liquid mercury , found inside the old
thermostats, i slowed down, to try to get a better look , and try managing to keep the car steady , i slowed down, trying examed , this object , i couldn't, make out any fine details
it almost seemed to be slowly rotating ,as it was hovering ,  i tried figure out what i was looking at, this was no jet or airplane , thought it may have been a balloon ,but we have all seen how they wobble and slowly rise up, this was dead still in position .
there were other car behind me , as i approach my right turn on to the horseman road, i started i losing sight of it thru the tree line, i drove to the other end of the horseman road , where it was open view of the same sky section and looked for the object again ,,,,but it was gone, 

this was in 1996 and digital cameras were not as common as today , no proof to certify what was seen.
i  only hope the persons who where parked long berrymills road, happen read this piece and can provide more details of that object, seen that day in jan to april of 1996
content.summary: Spotted a pill shaped , metal , silver mercury object stationary in sky on my home for lunch ,

content.detailedDescription:
I was lighting off fireworks for friends and a guest noticed a ball flying towards the house and brought it to my attention. i didn't see the fiirst orb but saw the other 2 that came after it. i followed an orb until it stopped glowing and the ascended over some tree's. i then went out the next 2 nights at about the same time and saw the same type of objects fly in the exact same pattern coming from and going in the same direction as the previous night. 

the first feeling we had was trying to think of things that would make sense of what we saw. the more we tried the less things made since. the strangest thing about the sighting is the thought of the orbs flying about 20 over my house and i would have never known had i not seen it for myself.
content.summary: Occurred 3 nights in a row

content.detailedDescription:
My sister and i were out visiting one of her friends that lives in weatherford, tx. we left her friends at around 1 a.M. and proceeded to drive home. my sister was driving and i was in the passenger seat. we took 730n towards azle, tx. 730n has a lot of little hills that keep you from seeing into the valley over the next hill. immediately grabbing both of our attentions was a ufo hovering maybe 50 ft. off the ground and partially over a house about 100 yards away from the road. the object consisted of three rows of spinning red and blue lights. the top and bottom lights were bright blue and were appearing to rotate clockwise at around 200 rpm. the middle lights were bright red and a lot larger than top and bottom ones and were rotating at high rpm in the opposite direction as the top and bottom lights. i could not see the structure of the craft because of the brightness of the lights on the craft. the object was tilted and spinning like crazy with no wobbling. my sister slowed the car down so we could stare at this thing. a car passed us as we were slowed down so i know there were other witnesses to this thing. we lost sight of this ting after we went through another valley. i am still thoroughly freaked out by the incident and it was over a year ago.
i am angry at my sister for not turning around so we could possibly get a photo of the object. we were both freaked out and not thinking clearly enough to get a photo or video. we will both be willing to take lie detector test.

         ooooo
        @@@@@@@
         ooooo
content.summary: Three rows of spinning lights, middle row bright red spinning counterclockwise, top and botton bright blue spinning clockwise, tilted at around 30 degrees

content.detailedDescription: On saturday feb. 25 at 8:52 pm, my wife and i had just stepped out of the pickup when i noticied something really bright in the sky.  it came into dublin from the southeast and continued traveling to the northwest.  it looked like one fireball at first and then it would look like 2 fireballs side by side.  they looked like they were spiining around each other or vibrating.  it also appeared to have a fluttering movement to it. it was moving very fast.  there was also a strong static feeling in the air.  the flight path was straight but it was not smooth at all.  it appeared to have blurry edges like it was vibrating.  it made no sound.  there is a mufon report from south texas that same night at 8:30 pm. that one was moving north.  we saw this object in north central texas at 8:52 pm.  they very well could be the same object as there was alot of similarities. we watched it for about 30 seconds and then it just disappeared.
content.summary: Redish-orange light or fireball moving at a high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: I was going to bed, it was about 2:15 am on feb. 23rd... when i looked out my back window and saw a light appear. im always looking outside because ive seen other lights in the past. so i kept starring at it and said to myself, "if that light does anything unusual, im grabbing my phone... and  thats when i saw the light do a fast turn to the left, then straight up into the sky and dimmed out, then got really really bright red... hovered, then dropped really fast.. thats when i ran out of my back door and shot video of the light.
content.summary: Saw a bright red light that would turn orange/copper, then bright green, then back to red and glow bright with no other flashes or lights... kept during acrobatics in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was with a co worker and we were cleaning a burg king after hours. we finished up around 2.00am i went outside first wile my co worker set the alarm to the building (burger king) i was covered in degreaser from cleaning the smoke stacks. i was filthy dirty and tired so i laid down where a car would park and looked up���  this is when i saw it right above me with my own two eyes! it was 3 green triangles in formation flying from west to east.  i was so scared i ran back to the door and yelled for my co worker to come out and look but he was to busy setting the alarm so i turned around and studied it the best i could and i know one thing it was as real as they get! my mind was not playing tricks with me!!!   my co worker came out and saw the tail end of the event but he did not see it like i did!!! it���s been years and ive only told a few people but now it���s time to tell the world.. oh ya about a couple of weeks after the sighting there was a news broadcast on kxly news 4 spokane..  the broadcast was a man looking for anyone who had seen anything strange in the sky anytime recent and there was a phone number to call��� so i did and i talked to a retired military officer who wanted to meet me for lunch and talk further but i got scared and hung up the phone. i only wish to share my experience with the world as this event has affected me for some time now!
content.summary: Three green triangles flying west to east @ 2.00am

content.detailedDescription: Was outside for lunar eclipse that morning with uncle.Decided to look up at stars to see how bright they where.When i looked for orin i notced lights above trees.I started filming to the batterys ran out for no reason.Worked at the atl airport for over 5 years.It wasnt an airplane just lights is all i could see.
content.summary: Flashing lights across street from my house.Low orbit drain batterys on camera.During moon eclipse. have a disc video of some of it

content.detailedDescription: My wife  noticed this real bright red round like orb hovering about 300 feet of the tree tops from our front deck. it just set there for over 20 min and then  faded as it moved away toward fallbranch tennessee from jonesborough. it moved very slow no sound.I have recorded something similar during the day could be some kind of drone.  i was able to take some video of it with a high resolution camera and save frames that i blew up in photo shop. i have listed both to see. it did have all of the dogs in the area barking for quite sometime. this is one of many sitings from my home that have been reported here. we are both amazed that we have seen so many things like this from our deck.
content.summary: bright red round orb

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i was returning home from bangor and was crossing the allamoosic bridge on rt 46, bucksport when off to the right of us,we saw about a mile away, this large slice of pie shaped object coming at us hugging the treetops. i slowed down as we watched it approach, cross and disappear over the treetops, to our left. it was very close, it had a white light that switched to orange on its underbelly. the light wasn't a single dot or beam but was more like a luminous panel. it was grey/charcoal in color. it was not aerodynamic by any means. it did not make a sound, it did not seem to bother the trees it was "floating" over, i say floating for it was moving very very slow...Maybe 15-20 mph.
 i could only see a side and its underbelly and then as it passed by, the back and underbelly. the side and back had an "industrial" appearance to them. the bottom or underbelly was smooth and covered those illuminated "panels".
 
this "craft" was observed by two people in full daylight on a very clear day. it was very close.
content.summary: Large pie shaped object passes about 1500 ft in front of us.

content.detailedDescription: We were heading north on riverside dr. on our way home from dinner on sat. feb 25, 2012 at a distance of approximately 1/4 mile from our residence when we noticed a bright, reddish light in the northern sky. we drove into our driveway and parked. my wife watched the light while i went into our rv and retreived the camera. the light was gone when i met up with my wife. she stated that it had accellerated to the north and vanished.
content.summary: My wife and i witnessed a bright reddish light in the northern sky on the way home from dinner.

content.detailedDescription:
at about 10pm last night i took my dog out for his nightly dutys . i was looking at the sky for any ufos and how the stars had changed positions . my dog wanted in the house now . i let him and somethng caught my eye . it was 2 orbs that was hovering by my neighbors yard . i watched it and ( i had my night vision glasses with me ) the orb was round . but when i looked at it without the night vision it had spikes radiating from it . i started to talk to it and it came a little closer . then it went back to where it was i also noticed that there was a second orb that was smaller to the left of it. it just sat there and did not move . about 20 minutes later i got a call on skype and i had to answer it so i left the orbs  and went into the house .  i don't know , but i feel i will see them again don't ask me why 
    thank you
content.summary: Even field investigators have sightings

content.detailedDescription:
1. we where on a flight from the uk to the island of cyprus. the event happened more then half way through the flight and we took pictures and videos.

2. i was filming the view from the plane when i heard people talk about the object behind me.

3. i had no idea what it could have been when i first saw it.

4. the object flew fast next to the plane then slowed its speed to match the plane. two beams emerged from the object that seemed to be scanning the plane (evident in picture) then the object suddenly changed direction in very fast speed.

5. when i first saw the object i was scared as i didn't know what it was. the whole plane apx 100 people saw the objects and started to panic. the captain then asked everyone to fasten their seat belts and not to panic.

6. we lost sight of the object when it flew away in a speed much faster then our plane.

there are more pictures and a short video i just didnt get a chance to load them to the pc
content.summary: The ufo came near to our flying plane. all passangers aboard saw it including the crew. many people took pictures including me.

content.detailedDescription: I just saw the object about an hour ago, i am at work and was out smoking a cigarette out at my car when i white object caught the corner of my eye, it was very very white, vibrant i would say even when passing under the clouds it continued to have the shinny effect, it was also low flying so i seen a distinguished shape it had no wings at all no markings and slow flying i went for my cell phone to try and get a pic, but to be honest i really couldnt stop looking at it and studying it... i have never seen anything like this before in my life... i wanted to contact wsaz the news channel in charleston to ask if anyone had seen something in the sky this morning, but i kinda dont want to be sounding kinda crazy... i dont know what it was except it was a slow, cigar shaped, but the color white it was.. the prettiest thing i seen.. and the slow movement it had but at the same time so fluid and natural. after seeing the object move to the other side of the building where my office is i came in to call my wife and tell her after which i had went back outside maybe 4-5 mins after i saw the object i seen 3 jets moving to the north the same way as the object... i thought that hopefully someone else had seen this object too and my know more. thanks nathan.
content.summary: Shinny white cigar shaped object, moving slow and low in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Green light zoomed by the sky and disappeared into the sky, did not witness it land or hit the ground.
content.summary: Passed by incredibly fast

content.detailedDescription: Blinked every 5 min, stationary,yellow maybe orange...Cameras wouldnt catch not high grade enough...My word of honor...
content.summary: On off every 5 min. 4 1 hr stationary (same as wv description) hus says actually was located in s. jersey sky not here

content.detailedDescription: Driving on the bqe just as i reached  the kosciuszko bridge a light appeared similar to a shooting star with a tail but moving much quicker. the object reminded me of the light that was filmed in jerusalem above the dome of the rock.
content.summary: Bluish/purple light moving swiftly

content.detailedDescription: Driving on the bqe just as i reached  the kosciuszko bridge a light appeared similar to a shooting star with a tail but moving much quicker. the object reminded me of the light that was filmed in jerusalem above the dome of the rock.
content.summary: Bluish/purple light moving swiftly

content.detailedDescription: On the nite of the new moon in july of 2007 i was on duty at the atx truck yard it was after midnite and my shift was over, we had just began to chenge over and something appeared over the northern horizon and it appeared to look like the moon but comming from the north i ignored it then realized that is not where th moon comes up from but it was kind of glowing it rose up on the horizon like the moon would very slowly but it had a kind of red orange glow to it. i watched it for a while then just ignored it and began my long trip home,heading east on i-20 from west ft worth. as i pulled out to i-20 i got a full view of the craft from the back. it was saucer shapped about 2 stories high with a wide mettal band in the middle with 5 rows of colored flashing lighs blinking  and shifting it would pulsate then the lights would change colors the rows of lights would shift directions bink and the change the patern again the road was always almost empty so i slowd down to observe the object. it floated on what looked like black fumes,it made no noise and as i got closer i could hear the chinook helicopters! i thought ok this must be a collage hoax, so i sped up to observe form the side of the craft then the top of the craft began to rotatei thought wow what great trick but i didnt see the choppers but i could hear them in the didtance the rotation just turned about 30 degrees and stopped. the whole time i was driving slowly observing the craft. it stayed on the north side of i-20 flying in a nap of the earth fassion just then a blue beam of light laser like came through my car it was a pinpoint and came through the car straight through but didnt damage anything the beam centerd in my car then rotated over to me then flattened out from a pinpoint to a flat wide beam. the beam centerd on me then began to go up and down my body,no heat no noise it made an up and down pass then went back to a point then blinked out. then i was just befuttled about thes so i sped up faster to pass up the vehicle and as i watched it i could observe an observation deck which was wide open i cuold see 6 occupants,4 greys and 2 realy tall differant types they were tall with white silver hair and they were observing the road ahead and holding hands with the greys like parents comforting children. after i saw this i slowed down even more the craft kept moving up and dowh and alternating with the elevation of the land and i could still hear the choppers in the distance i observed the craft as we came to a populated area so i stayed paralel with the craft as long as i could. i observed the craft move ove a lighted football field and so i thought ok it is a hoax the craft was larger in diamiter than a football field! the craft then crossed the highway and proceeded in a south/southeast direction,then as more traffic became visible the craft moved in an unimaginable speed leaving streeks of lite as it left. end of report
content.summary: Observed craft come south then followed i-20 heading east

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
1.Leaving walmart
2 i noticed them because of their star like objects were so bright and extremely low
3i thought they were stars at first glance but soon discovered it not to be.
4 first they was stationary around a particularly dark cloud. then one separated itself from the rest and the rest formed sort of a triangle shape but not exactly. at this time they were still at the same altitude as they were when i first noticed them. the last formation they made was a horizontal line. after about 30 mins and then we left. 
5 during the sighting i called cnn and made a report. five mins upon ending the call, 20-30 aircrafts were in the same airspace as the starlike objects. to me that was to many to be i that small area of sky. i know that they were aircrafts because of the flashing lights used by plans and helicopters at night. if they weren't ufos then why so many aircrafts to the response. also the cnn woman said i was the only person to report this. i lose sight of the object when all the aircrafts came to the area. we left from the scene after my cousin reminding us of prior engagements.
content.summary: This was just recorded on 02/25/2012 over georgia. we witnessed it at about 7:20 it lasted for about 30 mins. contacted cnn and reported it. 20 -30 government aircrafts responded to the lights in the sky but cnn said no one else reported it.
